Enumeration Case# kSCSIProtocolFeature_CPUInDiskMode

macOS 10.12+

```
kSCSIProtocolFeature_CPUInDiskMode = 2
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/kernel/1638592-anonymous/kscsiprotocolfeature_cpuindiskmode#discussion)

Used to determine if the SCSI Protocol Services Driver supports a CPU which is in target disk mode.
